verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During Wednesday 's edition of Morning Joe] , the panel [ARGM-ADV: almost] [V: seemed] [ARG1: happy that the President ’s planned summit with North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un scheduled for June 12 may not pan out] .
